1.content:
You and your friend have just eaten breakfast after having a good night sleep. He is visiting from the mid west and has never been to California. You are both watching TV in the basement family room. Your friend says
"Hey Sean, when are your parents coming back?". Sean replies "Not until later this afternoon, they have an open house till about 5 o'clock Mike. Why?"
Mike says "Oh, I just wanted to do something more than watch TV on my first visit to California. I want to go to the beach, visit Disneyland and taste my first In & Out Burger".

Suddenly they hear the alarm go off. Sean says "Wait here, that came from the back door". Mike stays put reclining back on the sofa with his socked feet resting up on the foot rest. Sean peeks upstairs and sees two masked men sneaking around the first floor. He comes back down and says "Get your shoes on Mike. There's two masked men in my living room. We need to get out of here". Mike puts on his sneakers that he discarded the night before and Sean puts his shoes on. Both of them are slender built and tan, dressed in polo shirts and khaki shorts.
Sean hoists Mike up to open up the window, then tries to push him thru and out. Mike gets out and tries to grab Sean's hands to help him out.
"Grab my hand Sean". Sean tries, but can't reach Mike's hands. "Go next door and call the police, I'll hide till they get here".
Mike takes off running to the neighbors across the backyard field. Sean meanwhile, tries to trick the robbers if they come downstairs. First, he turns off the TV, then takes off his shoes and places them behind a curtain making believe someone is standing behind it. He hides in a closet behind some boxes and tries using his cell phone, but he gets no service.

Meanwhile, Mike has made it to Sean's neighbor's house only to find no one home. He tries another neighbor before sneaking back after finding no one home. As he gets close to the Sean's house, he sees a third masked man on stakeout. Mike sneaks around another way back down to where he escaped and peers thru the window. He carefully climbs in feet first as one of the masked men comes down to the basement. Mike sees him and tries to climb back out thru the window. The mask guy runs over and is able to grab hold of Mike's shoe. They both struggle, Mike trying to shake his foot loose and the masked guy trying to pull Mike back in. "Let go of my shoe!" Mike says. "Get in here or your going to get a bullet in you boy!" the masked man replies.
He yanks on Mike's foot and pulls his shoe off in the process along with his ankle sock. Mike escapes with one bare foot now, and hides behind a large bush. He looks down at his tan bare foot with pedicured toes and sees scratch marks on his heel and sole. He decides to shed his other shoe and sock and take his chance barefoot.
A moment later, the two masked men are searching the basement together. "I had the kid by his shoe, but it came off...and his sock too" says one of them. He shows the boy's shoe and sock. The other masked man uses a walkie talkie and says "Zack...come in Zack! Be on the look out for a teenage boy with one bare foot. Ben tried to keep him from escaping, but missed". Zack replies "Well do boss".
Sean can hear the two talk and makes a mental note of their names.

Later, Mike is seen running down the road barefoot, hopping occasionally since the asphalt is hot on his tender bare soles. A car comes up from behind him and Mike is grabbed into the car with his bare feet sticking out the window. It takes off, makes a U-turn and heads back up the road.

"Let me go...(struggles)" Mike yells. "I got to find help for my friend" he continues. A old rag is stuffed into his mouth forbidding him to talk. His bare toes splay as he tries to spit it out. His bare soles are gray and dirty due to him walking barefoot in the grass and road.
"Keep squirmin around you little brat and I'll cut off one of your toes!" the driver yells out. Mike settles down.
The SUV pulls up to Sean's house and Mike is carried into the house with Mike's toes wiggling.
Mike is thrown down onto the living room sofa face down with his bare feet hanging off one side. "This is not Sean, Sean has lighter hair. We need to find him fast! Search the house again!" the head masked person says. He points to one masked man to watch Mike.
The rest of them split up to search the house.

Mike's blindfold come partially off as the masked man sits next to him putting Mike's bare feet in his lap. "How come your feet are so dirty? Mike mumbles, then the masked man takes out the rag from his mouth. "It's a long story, but I tried to escape from the basement window and one of you guys grabbed my shoe. It ended coming off along with my sock. I run faster barefoot, so I took off my other shoe and sock and ran to get help. Running on hot asphalt will get anyone's feet dirty". The masked man pulls his mask off revealing to Mike that he's actually a young woman. "I love barefoot guys!" she says seductively to him. She begins to lick the grime off both of his bare feet and suck on his toes. Mike is taken back and turns onto his back. His toes splay again as a result of them being nibbled and sucked on.

Sean meanwhile has made his way up to the first floor and sees the young woman sucking on his friend's toes and licking his bare soles. As he's about to surprise them. Another masked man hits his head from behind knocking him out cold. Sean is picked up and carried to the adjacent sofa. A blindfold is put over his eyes and his hands and socked feet are zip tied. Mike's blindfold is readjusted and then hit on the head, knocking him out. The head masked man shoots the young woman with a dart killing her instantly.
"I've always had trouble with her, she has a terrible foot fetish. We'll throw her down the hill when we leave, I don't need her anymore!" Mike and Sean are then carried to the car followed by the rest of the masked men. The young woman's body is thrown in the trunk. As the car drives down the road, her body is tossed over the cliff. The corpse falls down about 100 feet landing behind some rocks and bushes.
They leave an tell tale clue, Mike's discarded shoe and sock on the stairs leading to the basement TV room.

111.content:
Sean and Mike are found tied back to back in a dark room with a small beam of light resting on Mike's bare feet. Mike wakes up first and with his blindfold off, notices the light shining on his bare feet. He wiggles his toes, then realizes he's tied up to someone. He tried to wake him up by moving back and forth, soon finding out it was Sean. "Sean, wake up. We need to get out of here some how". There's no answer. Mike is able to get his bare feet free and manages to use them to move to a nearby wall to stand up. Sean is still unconscious, but has his blindfold down around his neck.

Mike is able to use his right barefoot to get Sean's sock off his foot, then tickle it with his foot. He remembers Sean is very ticklish on his bare toes and soles. Sean begins to giggle and shake his foot about. He wakes up and looks down at his bare foot being tickled by Mike's barefoot. "Where are we? Why is my one foot bare? Mike, what happen to your shoes? Mike replies "Somewhere out in the country. I could hear the wind blowing and heat on my bare feet. I took your sock off with my foot to tickle you to wake you up. I'm barefoot due to the fact that my one shoe...and sock got pulled off by one of the robbers as I tried to escape thru the basement window. You know I run faster in bare feet, so I discarded my other shoe and sock and ran barefoot".
Sean says "The last thing I remember is seeing a young women licking your bare feet". Mike replies saying "Yeah, she noticed my dirty soled feet and offered to clean them...with her tongue! Her tongue sure cleaned them both up".
They suddenly hear a noise and quickly sit back down back to back. Sean is able to get his sock back on his foot and blindfold around his eyes just in time. Mike's blindfold is put back almost right.

A door slams open and a bright light shines down on the two young boys. In barges scruffy, bearded men wearing all black and black caps. "The name's Skull. I've kidnapped you two because your parents are millionaires" says Skull. He pulls down Sean's blindfold, then Mike's blindfold. "You are worth about a million to us Sean". Sean gives him a scared look. "Who's your friend?".
Sean replies "Uh my friend Mike. He's visiting me from the Midwest". Skull looks over at Mike. Skull says to him "Why are you barefoot? Where's your shoes?" Mike replies "It's a long story, but they're at Sean's house, so are my socks". Skull says to his henchman "You forgot to bring his shoe and sock? The police are going to have some key evidence.
Skull asks Sean "Why are you wearing only socks on your feet? Where are your shoes?". Sean replies "Uh, I don't like shoes, but love to wear socks? I don't own many shoes Skull". "Wrong answer my kidnapped tike! First of all, you refer to me as sir only and second, your parents are rich, so they can afford to buy you lots of pairs of shoes". Skull walks over and pulls off Sean's two socks revealing his tan bare feet. Sean wiggles his toes. Skull smiles and says "Nice bare feet boy".

At Sean's house, his parents and the police are waiting for a phone call. Sean's mom finds Mike's discarded shoe and sock which are taken as evidence. A police officer scouring the yard, finds Mike's other shoe and sock and brings them into the head detective. Sean's mom is upset "Where's my son? I hope his friend Mike's okay...barefoot". The head detective reassures her saying "They'll both be fine".

Meanwhile, back at an undisclosed location, Sean and Mike are untied and given something to eat. Both are still barefoot. Skull takes his camera and tell the boys to act normal as he records a ransom video. He begins the video and says "Your boy and his friend are okay (he shows both Sean and Mike on camera from head to toe). They are alive and barefoot for now, but if you don't wire 2 million dollars into this overseas account by 6 pm tonight, they both will be striped naked and shot in the head. Their bodies will be cut up and buried in a deep hole...your choice. By the way...Mike was already barefoot, Sean bared his feet after I took off his socks. As a threat, I will cut off his big toe at noon if I don't hear back from you confirming the wire will take place". He orders Sean to talk "Mom, dad, I'm okay, please don't let them cut off my big toe...please pay the ransom!". Skull zooms into Sean's right big toe and stops recording. He tells his lead henchman to send the video.

With the masked men out of the room where he’s hiding, Sean sees his chance and makes a run for the door in his bare feet. Unfortunately, as he gets to the front hall, one of the men is ascending the stairs from the basement, and shoots Sean in his butt with a tranquilizer dart. Mike yells out in pain, and then quickly feels a warm, woozy feeling come over him, before he blacks out cold on the floor by the door.

At times during his blackout, Sean vaguely registers sensations, and he awakens at least once in the back of a vehicle on the road, and can hear and feel his friend Mike, though he can’t see him due to a blindfold over his eyes. His mouth is also gagged, as Mike’s must similarly be, from the muffled whining of his friend. He hears the men discussing that they were after one, and got another free one in the bargain. “One WHAT?” Sean wonders before the drugs again send him deep into a warm, fuzzy sleep.


When he does finally fully awaken, Sean…

info.brief_description: Your friend & you are in your parent's house watching TV, all of sudden robbers break in.
info.description:
You are a high school teenager about 15 years old living in a rich neighborhood in Bel Air, CA. Your friend is about the same age and is visiting from out of state. Your parents run a real estate office that is doing very well. Though you live in a well protected neighborhood and have an alarm system, robberies still occur.

Have fun...anything goes...
